description:
**Tool Overview**: A resource for IT administrators regarding the management of feature updates for Windows 11.
This link offers insights on how Microsoft is moving away from force-installing Windows 11 feature updates on PCs. **Details**: 1. Explains the change in Microsoft's update policy. 2. Provides guidance for system administrators managing Windows 11 deployments. 3. Discusses potential impacts on IT operations when updating feature sets. 4. Highlights the importance of planning and scheduling updates rather than forcing them. 5. Encourages best practices for maintaining system stability during updates.
